title: Instruction Following
useCase: Creating content based on specific requirements or guidelines.
commentary: Foundation for most LLM interactions. Accuracy varies by complexity and domain knowledge.

title: Browser & Desktop Use
useCase: Automating repetitive web tasks or navigating complex web interfaces.
commentary: Still maturing but showing promise for web automation and desktop interaction.

title: Tool Use
description: Use various tools like code interpreters and external APIs.
useCase: Executing code, retrieving data, or calling external services.
commentary: Greatly expands LLM capabilities by connecting to external systems and data sources.

title: Reasoning
description: Apply logical and complex reasoning skills to solve problems.
useCase: Solving multi-step problems requiring logical inference and analysis.
commentary: Strength varies across domains with math and science reasoning continually improving.

title: Image Processing and Generation
description: Analyzes, modifies, and creates images from textual prompts.
useCase: Generating artwork, concept art, photo editing, object recognition.
commentary: Rapidly evolving field with increasingly realistic and complex outputs.
